TopicTitle: Mission Lines fade at innapropriate POV

Articles.Content:
I made a little video to show you how when plotting a satellite mission intercept, the mission target orbit line seen as red here fades to abscurity at precisely the wrong moment, ie when you zoom in close to make a fine adjustment the line vanishes from view. 

The line needs to remain visible, and btw this is true of all orbit lines as far as I can see and they should never fade. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
